text:
The DR is a 3rd party metric created by Ahrefs and it doesn’t necessarily mean your site is doing better in terms of SEO. Yes there’s is a correlation between SEO performance and DR but absolutely no guarantees. For example, there were times when our DR dropped and organic traffic was growing fast. 

The thing is, DR is an Ahrefs metric whereas organic traffic comes from GA/GSC. Completely different things.

elements.text: The DR is a 3rd party metric created by Ahrefs and it doesn’t necessarily mean your site is doing better in terms of SEO. Yes there’s is a correlation between SEO performance and DR but absolutely no guarantees. For example, there were times when our DR dropped and organic traffic was growing fast.
The thing is, DR is an Ahrefs metric whereas organic traffic comes from GA/GSC. Completely different things.

If anyone knows what to do with said whales to either get them back up or produce more whales I'm all ears! :ear:

Thank you content pros!

text:
<@U01MM4EAC69>, maybe try writing a few success stories. People who were mentored and rose beyond all expectation. The more feel good the better.
 This could grow into a series.
Also give a bash at something engaging, such as “Check the progress of our rising stars”. Post regular updates (weekly) on a success story bio, generating “followers” to that persons unique story.

Looking around the site (quickly, so please forgive any incorrect assumptions), most content is general and the only “personal” content that I saw was xyz/work-with-us. So, you would be hitting a totally different mindset than is currently engaging with your online brand.
For social reach, get a few barter/trades going with existing clients - where they can fund half a rising stars’ further studies, and put a “Match This” challenge out on to social media…

Don’t forget the power of a large businesses internal mailing list, where they send out blasts to their internal staff. Try get your mails on these sends. Super powerful and highly engaged. Goes out onto social very fast also.

Just a few quick ideas :wink:
